name: MLS Live 1080p for Google Chrome - alpha v0.2
description:
An alpha version of MLS Live for 1080p monitors! I don't really know what I'm doing too well, but I got somewhat the result I wanted to. I wanted all information viewable from one window.

Press the X on the chatbox, and you should be good to go!

FUTURE VERSION:
Clean white space.
Make player big by default (if possible)
Enlarge player (if possible)
additional_info:
August 30th, 2012
-First version

August 30th, 2012
-Fixed silly wrong number causing the formations to be slightly covered by the video player.
